bow: what something gross you never thought you would do as parent just spent minutes getting the biggest booger out of my 19 months old son nose needless to say it waiting on the dresser for my but we were at my grandma once and my daughter was eating chip something got stuck in her throat and heard gurgling noise and instinctively cupped my hands in front of her and yup she upchucked all fast enough to get your kid out of there using those long tube snot sucker things on your infant that you put in your mouth and suck to create suction while you re in the bathroom at 2a with the tube thing that has filter actually quite effective similar to op and infjenn never thought would use the nose frieda device to suck out the snot from my son nose with my mouth with nothing but tube and small piece of sponge to separate me from the germs snot thought would never smell my child butt to see if they pooped ha that probably one of the least gross things ve had to do lick chocolate yogurt cheese dust off my year olds fingers in pinch also on nearly daily basis putting my cupped hand under her chin to catch something she wants to spit out cleaned poop off of every surface within ve had to shake out poop and put an otherwise dry diaper back on my child when caught without diaper when out of the house so many bathtub poops my son stopped doing it just in time for my daughter to start so sick of cleaning poop out of the tub oh and once my son tried to eat used gum he found on the ground kids are gross oh god yes the bathtub poops for some reason my daughter would do this every bath we ended up putting her in the bath for minutes then getting her out to sit on the toilet did this last night doesn even phase me anymore when my son was few weeks old was so sleep deprived it was awful so we go to an appointment and see tiny yellow spot on his leg classic breastmilk poop spot so go to pick my thumb to wipe it off before we get in to see the doctor as my thumb is moving to my mouth see too late yellow spot on my thumb so licked my thumb that had poop stain on it to wipe poop stain from my son do not miss the newborn stage my year old vomited an entire belly full of half digested sweet and sour pork down the wall side of his upper bunk bed his little bro sleeping below not sure anything from infancy prepared me for cleaning up that mess gift the booger sucker to pooping literally just standing there holding my kid legs up watching him poop on the diaper just put under his butt figured be cleaning up my share of vomit poop and other body fluids never thought my child would puke in the tub while was in it that was probably the grossest thing that has happened and had to stay calm while cleaned us both up and the tub because she was upset about throwing up cleaning up diapering the baby meanwhile was trying not to gag fun times lmao its funny how proud we are to show off our kid giant boogers our family also all suffered the stomach bug together trying doing and why and wanting to climb into my lap my little girl is only months so sure worse is yet to come but so far mines probably when went to change poopy diaper only to realize she was done and
